      • removeIngredientFromRecipe

                                       java.lang.String ingredientName)
        Removes an ingredient (inventory) from a recipe
        Parameters:
        recipeId - The recipe to be operated on
        ingredientName - The ingredient to be removed

      • search

        public java.util.List<Recipe> search(Search search)
        Returns a List of recipes that match the Search paramaters Recipes must match all, if any, types, fall under the specified number of time (minutes) and above the star rating Must also have the keyword if specified

        If no parameter is explicated, filter will not be applied for that parameter

        Parameters:
        search - The Search holding the filtering parameters - can have any, all, or none of the fields specified
        Returns:
        The valid List of Recipes
